text:
Degreed | Multiple Roles | SF, SLC, NL | REMOTE | Full-time | https://degreed.com

Degreed exists to discover, empower and recognize the next generation of the world's expertise. Come help us build the tools and solutions to shape the future of learning and skills recognition. Weâ€™re a well-funded startup with many large Fortune 500 clients.

We're a remote-first company with offices in SF, SLC and Netherlands. Our tech stack is ASP.NET/C#/Azure/Angular/TypeScript.

What we're offering:

  - Competitive salary
  - Equity
  - Great work-life balance
  - Flexible work schedules
  - Amazing people and culture
  - Outcomes/results focused
We're hiring for many positions, such as:

  - Data warehouse engineer
  - Machine learning engineer
  - Software developer
  - Azure developer
  - HR/Sales/IT positions as well
Apply here: https://jobs.lever.co/degreed
